subject: Athletics and Sports
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Sports’ top-rated broadcasts, its star athletes, and its valuable teams and leagues help explain why the talent agency William Morris Endeavor paid about $2.4 billion for IMG.
snippet: Sports’ top-rated broadcasts, its star athletes, and its valuable teams and leagues help explain why the talent agency William Morris Endeavor paid about $2.4 billion for IMG.
